vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.20;
son of: Seir (H8165B);
brother of: Shobal (H7732), Zibeon (H6649H), Anah (H6034H), Dishon (H1787), Ezer (H0687), Dishan (H1789) and Timna (H8555H);
father of: Hori (H2753H), Hemam (H1950)
§ Lotan = "covering"
the eldest son of Seir the Horite
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
羅坍 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "覆蓋物"
何利人西珥的長子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
罗坍 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "覆盖物"
何利人西珥的长子
